title: Add oal.search.PointNearestNeighborsQuery and oal.document.*Point.newNearestNeighborsQuery()
description:
Multidimensional points have a range query but they don't have a nearest neighbors query.

Requesting oal.search.PointNearestNeighborsQuery and oal.document.*Point.newNearestNeighborsQuery()

http://www.alglib.net/other/nearestneighbors.php

comments.content: There is already a nearest neighbors query in Lucene's sandbox module for lat/lon (2D) points, accessible from LatLonPoint.nearest; maybe that could be adapted to more general Euclidean distance for N dimensional points?
comments.author: Michael McCandless

comments.content: Erick Erickson I'm quite new at consuming Lucene, but I'll see what I can come up with.
comments.author: Eric R Hartford
